name: Bullard City Park
description: A peaceful community park with walking trails, a playground, and picnic areas.

description: Popular BBQ restaurant known for its brisket and local atmosphere.

description: Scenic trails great for biking, jogging, and photography.

description: Learn about the heritage of Bullard and surrounding East Texas.

name: Eagle's Bluff Golf Course
description: Stunning golf course with lake views and excellent facilities.

description: Award-winning local winery and distillery with tours and tastings.

name: Lake Palestine
description: A favorite for boating, fishing, and waterfront picnics.
